channel.title: Welcome to NeuroTechHub on NeuroTechHub
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to NeuroTechHub on NeuroTechHub

item.title: Neural Signal Processing Workshop: From Raw Data to Insights
item.description: Learn practical techniques for processing neural signals, from preprocessing to feature extraction and classification.

item.title: Getting Started with Brain-Computer Interfaces: A Beginner's Guide
item.description: A comprehensive guide for newcomers to brain-computer interface technology, covering basic concepts, hardware requirements, and your first BCI project.

item.title: Welcome to NeuroTechHub: Building the Future Together
item.description: Introducing NeuroTechHub - an open community for advancing brain-computer interface technology through collaboration and shared knowledge.

item.title: The Future of Neural Interfaces: Beyond Brain-Computer
item.description: A visionary talk exploring the next decade of neural interface technology, from therapeutic applications to human enhancement.
